serialization.name: Layout - Top/Over
serialization.description: 2 top-over-bottom panes in an adaptive layout grid.

strings.jsxtext:
Window Swap: version 3.1
JSX version: 3.6

This example demonstrates how to have GI content 'break-away' into a separate window, and return it again to the original application

Initially,when the user clicks the 'Swap to/from Window' button, a new window is created (or reused if it has been created previously), and the pane that is to be swapped is adopted by the new window.

When viewing that content in the new window, it is returned to the main application if the window is closed or the used clicks the 'Swap to/from Window' button again. If the button is used, the window will also be closed.
